item.ptxt: ECM uses TCM, combination meter, ABS / ESP® control module and CAN communication to transmit and receive data for cruise control. Therefore, check that no DTC is detected from ECM, TCM, ABS / ESP® control module before performing this Cruise Control System Symptom Diagnosis. If DTC is detected, correct trouble indicated by that DTC first.
Check each part in the order from the top of the following list.

condition.ptxt: “CRUISE” or “SET” indicator light does not turn ON or OFF

action.ptxt: Check MAIN (ON/OFF) switch for function referring to Cruise Control Switch Inspection:J20A and F9Q Model .
Check SET/COAST switch for function referring to Cruise Control Switch Inspection:J20A and F9Q Model .
Check brake light switch for function referring to Brake Light Switch Inspection:J20A and F9Q Model .
Repair.
Replace.
Replace after making sure that none of above parts is faulty.

condition.ptxt: Vehicle speed can not be set

action.ptxt: Check MAIN (ON/OFF) switch for function referring to Cruise Control Switch Inspection:J20A and F9Q Model .
Check SET/COAST switch for function referring to Cruise Control Switch Inspection:J20A and F9Q Model .
Check brake light switch for function referring to Brake Light Switch Inspection:J20A and F9Q Model .
Check CPP switch for function referring to CPP Switch (for Cruise Control) Inspection and Adjustment:J20A and F9Q Model .
Repair.
Replace after making sure that none of above parts is faulty.

condition.ptxt: Acceleration or deceleration is not available by using RES/ACC or SET/COAST switch

action.ptxt: Check RES/ACC or SET/COAST switch for function referring to Cruise Control Switch Inspection:J20A and F9Q Model .
Repair.
Replace after making sure that none of above parts is faulty.
Check CANCEL switch for function referring to Cruise Control Switch Inspection:J20A and F9Q Model .
Check brake light switch for function referring to Brake Light Switch Inspection:J20A and F9Q Model .
Check CPP switch for function referring to CPP Switch (for Cruise Control) Inspection and Adjustment:J20A and F9Q Model .
Repair.
Replace after making sure that none of above parts is faulty.

condition.ptxt: Cruise control at vehicle speed stored in memory cannot be resumed after cruise control was cancelled by means other than MAIN (ON/OFF) switch

action.ptxt: Check RES/ACC switch for function referring to Cruise Control Switch Inspection:J20A and F9Q Model .
Repair.
Replace after making sure that none of above parts is faulty.
